description: Designed to be Noticed Fashion-Forward Keep your iPod safe and secure in a case that’s sure to be noticed. The tough polycarbonate shell has a multi-faceted surface pattern, with selective polishing, etching and brushing effects. It’s also designed to feel good in your hands. Protection that Fits: The thin, yet durable material is a stylish way to keep your iPod's surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Emerge 012 Metal Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation (Arbor Green)
